projects.name: VSCode Extension Development
projects.description: Develop the "Agentic Tools MCP Companion" VSCode extension that provides a GUI interface for the existing agentic-tools-mcp server functionality. Features include task management interface with hierarchical tree view and memory management interface with search capabilities.

tasks.name: Phase 1: Project Structure and Dependencies
tasks.details: Update package.json with proper dependencies (@lancedb/lancedb, natural, svd-js, zod). Create modular folder structure: models/, providers/, services/, utils/, views/. Set up TypeScript configuration and build system.

tasks.name: Phase 2: Data Models and Compatibility
tasks.details: Create TypeScript interfaces that exactly match the MCP server models: Project, Task, Subtask, Memory. Include all input/output types and ensure 100% compatibility with existing data structures.

tasks.name: Phase 3: Task Management Interface
tasks.details: Implement TaskTreeProvider with hierarchical tree view (Projects → Tasks → Subtasks). Create TaskTreeItem with context menus, icons, and completion status. Add CRUD operations and file operations for .agentic-tools-mcp/tasks/tasks.json.

tasks.name: Phase 4: Memory Management Interface
tasks.details: Create memory search interface with semantic similarity search using TF-IDF + SVD. Implement memory display, CRUD operations, and LanceDB integration. Support filtering by category, agent, importance with pagination.

tasks.name: Phase 5: Service Layer Architecture
tasks.details: Create TaskService, MemoryService, and WorkspaceService classes. Implement business logic for data operations, file handling, LanceDB operations, workspace validation, and error handling with graceful degradation.

tasks.name: Phase 6: VSCode Integration and UI
tasks.details: Configure package.json with views, viewContainers, commands, menus, and keybindings. Create sidebar activity bar integration with proper icons, tooltips, and VSCode design patterns. Implement configuration settings.

tasks.name: Phase 7: Testing and Polish
tasks.details: Implement unit tests for services, integration tests with sample data, manual testing with real .agentic-tools-mcp directories. Add error handling, user feedback, performance optimization, and accessibility features.
